summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Tenth Avenue North from East Prospect Street to East Highland Drive, by laying water mains of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants, and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 655 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
